author: m.kalinin
content:
The `run_pending_deposit_applying` does not trigger registry updates:
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/tests/core/pyspec/eth2spec/test/helpers/deposits.py#L423-L425

Is the test runner on your side capable of doing it the same way?

author: m.kalinin
content: Is anyone else working on writing unit tests for Electra at the moment? I am currently finishing `get_expected_withdrawals` and next planning to take a look to other places with lack of the coverage, decided to check if such work is already in progress to avoid duplicated efforts
